attributes.action: advise foreign tourists to stay away from the uk as the tourism minister feels unsafe in her own home
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the tourism minister had to spend thousands of pounds on extra security because she doesnt feel safe in London.

If she feels this way, and she should know as she is a government minister, how can she persuade foreign visitors to visit our dangerous country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
